name: boysenberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a red-black fruit that grows on bushes, like a large raspberry: Mix 3 cups of fresh or frozen boysenberries with 3 cups of fruit yoghurt. Breakfast consisted of homemade teacakes with butter and boysenberry jam.
More examplesFewer examplesThe boysenberry is a blackberry and raspberry hybrid named after its progenitor, Rudolph Boysen.The pancake gift basket contains homemade pancake mix, boysenberry syrup, measuring cups, and a whisk.After the match, we went to the clubhouse for chicken sandwiches and boysenberry pie.
